Title: Relates to the number of persons recommended for appointment to the commission for the governor to choose from
Summary: Relates to the number of persons recommended for appointment to the Republic airport commission for the governor to choose from which shall be a list of no fewer than three persons.
LawCode: Amd ยง402, Transp L (as proposed in S.9475 & A.10336)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation law, in relation to the membership of the Republic airport commission
